name: Maulie Tankard

skills.name: Roast
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Damage increases by 50% if the target is under an HP Burn debuff.

effects.notes: Single target. +50% damage if target is under HP Burn.

skills.book_value: Minor: increases damage; not a high priority compared to A2/A3
skills.notes: Good single-target damage when enemies are burning; pairs well with HP Burn teams.

skills.name: Bar Brawl
skills.description: Places a Provoke debuff on all enemies for 1 turn. Has a 50% chance to place Provoke on the primary target for 2 turns instead. Places a 30% Reflect Damage buff on this champion for 2 turns.
skills.book_value: High: reduces cooldown (book to -1), core utility for arena/dungeons
skills.notes: Accuracy dependent for consistent Provoke application. Primary utility skill; book when you want more frequent provokes.

skills.name: Cheers!
skills.description: Revives an ally with 50% HP and fills their Turn Meter by 50%. Places a Block Damage buff on that ally for 1 turn.
skills.book_value: High: book to improve effectiveness (A3/A2 tome priority on community guides)
skills.notes: Very strong revival utility; combine with high-res allies to keep them alive. Books reduce cooldown and improve usability in longer fights.

skills.name: Rowdy Crowd
skills.description: Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 15% when this champion is hit. Fills allies' Turn Meters by 25% when hit by a Boss.
skills.notes: Excellent passive for speeding teams; procs frequently when Maulie is provoked/taunting and when enemies AOE. Very strong synergy with provoke/aggro comps.

forms.comments: Base form entry. Fill 'base_stats' with the user's in-game screenshot or the champion's ascended stats when available.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: ACC 200+, HP/DEF focus; not primary clan boss DPS
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: High ACC, solid SPD, tanky HP/DEF; pairs well as wave/tank in dungeons
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: High ACC for reliable Provoke, decent SPD, RES to survive

clan_boss: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER (A1 single-target DEF-scaling, 60% proc per skill). CORRECTED: Giant Slayer INCORRECT (no multi-hit skills).
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, Deterrence

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL - +50 ACC for 250+ total), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (CRITICAL - extends HP Burn debuffs for A1 bonus damage synergy), CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - cooldown reduction for A2 Provoke/A3 Revive)
dungeons: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER (A1 single-target DEF-scaling, 60% proc per skill). CORRECTED: Giant Slayer INCORRECT (no multi-hit skills).
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, STUBBORNNESS (CRITICAL - extra tankiness for wave control/Provoke role)

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL - +50 ACC for 250+ total), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (CRITICAL - extends HP Burn for A1 synergy), CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - faster A2/A3 cycling)
arena: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER (A1 single-target DEF-scaling, 60% proc per skill) OR Helmsmasher for Ignore DEF
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, Deterrence

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL - +50 ACC for reliable Provoke), Lore of Steel, UNSHAKEABLE (CRITICAL - +50 RES for reviver/control role, immunity to CC), CYCLE OF MAGIC (faster A2 Provoke/A3 Revive)
doom_tower: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER (A1 single-target DEF-scaling, 60% proc per skill). CORRECTED: Giant Slayer INCORRECT (no multi-hit skills).
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, Deterrence, UNSHAKEABLE (CRITICAL - +50 RES for reviver survivability)

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL - +50 ACC for 250+ total), Lore of Steel, LASTING GIFTS (CRITICAL - extends Block Damage buff from A3 Revive), CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - faster A2/A3 cycling), RESURGENCE (CRITICAL - faster A3 Revive cooldown)
faction_wars: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER (A1 single-target DEF-scaling, 60% proc per skill). CORRECTED: Giant Slayer INCORRECT (no multi-hit skills).
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, Deterrence

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL - +50 ACC for 250+ total), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (extends HP Burn for A1 synergy), CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - faster A2 Provoke/A3 Revive)
masteries.general: CORRECTED: Warmaster for all content (A1 single-target DEF-scaling, Giant Slayer INCORRECT). Master Hexer CRITICAL (extends HP Burn debuffs for A1 +50% damage bonus). Eagle Eye CRITICAL (+50 ACC for 250+ total, reliable Provoke). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2/A3 cooldowns - more frequent Provoke/Revive). Unshakeable CRITICAL (Arena/Doom Tower - +50 RES for reviver/control role, immunity to CC). Lasting Gifts CRITICAL (Doom Tower - extends Block Damage buff from A3 Revive). Resurgence CRITICAL (Doom Tower - faster A3 Revive cooldown). Stubbornness (dungeons - extra tankiness for Provoke/wave control role).

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: No major bad-AI reports in community guides; A2 targeting/Provoke relies on ACC and may miss if low ACC.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Maulie is more utility/tank than cheese; pairs well with HP Burn comps to increase A1 damage.

mechanics_advisory: Maulie's kit centers on team speed and control: consistent Provoke + TM on-hit passive makes her excellent as a dungeon/arena control/tank. Revive (A3) with TM fill and Block Damage makes her a strong safety net in longer fights. Ensure adequate ACC and RES for stability.

update_notes.last_patch: Created entry from community guide sources and flagged base_stats for user-supplied in-game screenshot
